# Gnome (Domain)
## Overview

| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | [[Baervan Wildwanderer]], [[Baravar Cloakshadow]], [[Callarduran Smoothhands]], [[Flandal Steelskin]], [[Gaerdal Ironhand]], [[Garl Glittergold]], Segojan Earthcaller, Urdlen |

**Granted Powers:** You cast illusion spells at +1 caster level.

**Gnome Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Silent Image (Spell)|Silent Image]]****:** Creates minor illusion of your design.

**2 [[Gembomb (Spell)|Gembomb]] <sup>M</sup>:** Gem becomes a bomb that deals 1d8 force damage/2 levels.

**3** **[[Minor Image (Spell)|Minor Image]]****:** As *[[Silent Image (Spell)|silent image]]*, plus some sound.

**4** **[[Minor Creation (Spell)|Minor Creation]]****:** Creates one cloth or wood object.

**5** **[[Hallucinatory Terrain (Spell)|Hallucinatory Terrain]]****:** Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field into forest, or the like).

**6 [[Fantastic Machine (Spell)|Fantastic Machine]]:** Creates a machine to perform a single simple task.

**7** **[[Screen (Spell)|Screen]]****:** Illusion hides area from vision, scrying.

**8** **[[Irresistible Dance (Spell)|Irresistible Dance]]****:** Forces subject to dance.

**9** **[[Summon Nature's Ally IX (Spell)|Summon Natureâ€™s Ally IX]]****\*:** Summons creature to fight.

  \*Earth elementals or animals only.
